articles.description: The Birmingham City striker heaped praise on the 19-year-old midfielder, claiming Borussia Dortmund starlet Bellingham will be the next England captain in three to four years time.
articles.content:
Troy Deeney has claimed that 'superstar' Jude Bellingham should shun Liverpool and instead join Real Madrid as his game is made for Spanish football.

articles.title: John Fury says Battle of Britain clash won't take place until NEXT year - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE INTERVIEW WITH CHARLOTTE DALY: John Fury is worried fans will have to wait until next year to watch Tyson Fury fight Anthony Joshua. He says AJ's team are ducking the fight.
articles.content:
John Fury says Tyson Fury's Battle of Britain clash with Anthony Joshua will not take place until next year as a defeat to the Gypsy King would be 'financial suicide' for AJ and his team.
